Reviews.Title: Outstanding features for price
Reviews.Author: W Stegner "great writing fan"
Reviews.Content: I read many reviews of lower priced SLRs before settling on the Nikon d5200.  The 24 Megapixels, the 39 focus points, an excellent metering system and rear flip screen monitor were all features that sold me.  My photography is primarily aimed at family travel and events, with good to excellent quality output.  There are a lot of features that were only available on the high end models a few years ago. -  The lens has outstanding optics for a zoom.  And great versatility.
